Ripe Apple.storageTip: Store in the fridge for the longest life.

Unripe Apple.storageTip: Will soften but not sweeten much. Best stored in the fridge.

Rotten Apple.storageTip: Discard immediately. Not safe to eat.

Ripe Banana.storageTip: For best flavor, keep on counter. Fridge will blacken peel but preserve fruit.

Unripe Banana.storageTip: Keep on the counter to ripen. Cold stops the process.

Rotten Banana.storageTip: Discard immediately. Not safe to eat.

Ripe Grape.storageTip: Must be refrigerated in a ventilated bag.

Unripe Grape.storageTip: Will not ripen further. Must be refrigerated.

Rotten Grape.storageTip: Discard immediately. Not safe to eat.

Ripe Guava.storageTip: Store in the refrigerator once ripe.

Unripe Guava.storageTip: Keep on the counter to ripen.

Rotten Guava.storageTip: Discard immediately. Not safe to eat.

Ripe Orange.storageTip: Store in the refrigerator to maximize freshness.

Unripe Orange.storageTip: Will not sweeten further. Store like a ripe orange.

Rotten Orange.storageTip: Discard immediately. Not safe to eat.

Ripe Pomegranate.storageTip: Store in a cool, dark place or refrigerate for very long life.

Unripe Pomegranate.storageTip: Will not ripen further. Store like a ripe pomegranate.

Rotten Pomegranate.storageTip: Discard immediately. Not safe to eat.

Unripe Strawberry.storageTip: Will not ripen further. Refrigerate immediately.

Rotten Strawberry.storageTip: Discard immediately. Not safe to eat.
